Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides with high proteolytic resistance for combating gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Wang J, Song J, Yang Z, He S, Yang Y, Feng X, Dou X, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:IC50=19.21 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:IC50=10.65 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>64µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli(MBC=1µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli K88(MBC=1µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli K99(MBC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MBC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2-4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MBC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MBC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MBC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MBC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=4µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=2.295µM)
